required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Blood Results of Covid 19 Positive Pregnants
clinical_study.official_title: Blood Results of Covid 19 Positive Pregnants

lead_sponsor.agency: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of blood results of covid 19 positive pregnant patients

primary_outcome.measure: Examination of changes in blood values of covid 19 positive pregnant patients
primary_outcome.description: peripheral blood values; hemogram, biochemistry (ast- sub-urea, creatinine, potassium, sodium, calcium, magnesium, vitamin d, homocysteine, ggt, crp)

intervention.intervention_name: Evaluation of blood results of covid 19 positive pregnant patients
intervention.description: peripheral blood values; hemogram, biochemistry (ast- sub-urea, creatinine, potassium, sodium, calcium, magnesium, vitamin d, homocysteine, ggt, crp)

biospec_descr.textblock:
peripheral blood values; hemogram, biochemistry (ast- sub-urea, creatinine, potassium,
      sodium, calcium, magnesium, vitamin d, homocysteine, ggt, crp)

study_pop.textblock: women with covid 19 positive pregnant women without additional disease and lung disease

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  pregnant

          -  covid19 positive

          -  no lung disease

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  with lung disease

          -  additional disease

          -  not pregnant pcr test negative

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital
